gwn.name: Gaming Wiki Network
gwn.about: The Gaming Wiki Network, or GWN, was founded on October 21, 2022 by 11 members and 3 affiliates. The GWN is a network of independently-hosted wikis about video game franchises and aims to support all gaming communities in building independently-hosted wikis. The GWN has 27 members and 5 affiliates at present.
